alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy showers with embedded thunder will impact portions of Essex and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 243 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of heavy showers and embedded thunderstorms containing very heavy rain over Lowell, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Peabody, Methuen, Billerica, Woburn, Chelmsford, Andover, Lexington, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Danvers, Wakefield, Reading, Burlington, Wilmington, Westford and Acton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex
